title: Project:Vi
body: Hey Riot,I believe that you are missing one more project skin,and i think this person would definetly suit it.Vi would look very nice with a project skin,she is part robot i guess and she hasnt had a new skin in a while, i believe it was Debonair. I understand that you cant have too many of one set of skins to but i think that you guys should consider making one for her. THANKS JAEDOS8{{champion:254}} {{champion:254}}

replies.body: most of the project skins wield swords other then {{champion:236}}  so i dont think vi would fit in.

Vi isn't really part robot, she just uses a robotic weapon. Its like using a gun. Wielding the weapon doesn't make you part robot. Also I really don't think vi really fits in with the rest of the other guys. They also have to fill a specific role and Yi already has the role of going jg. Nevertheless its a nice try but I don't think it'll work. However I'll be happy if they release a new vi skin because im not really a fan of the skins she has right now and would like a skin that actually completely changes her particles. Sorry bout the sentence block.
